name: Rockfall
description: Rockfall is the first official game by Noire Gamez and was created and launched in June 2015. Rockfall is a challenging, addictive and fun tap arcade runner influenced by the likes of Super Meat Boy, Flappy Bird & Jetpack Joyride. Avoid the red obstacles and tap your way through the dangerous runner, collecting as many coins as possible to gain a high score. Challenge your friends and the world on the Rockfall leaderboards and share your high scores to social media. Best of all Rockfall is FREE to play, only on Android!
